mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alerts (alert_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, AL_COUNT, CHECKED_FLAG, P_NAME, AL_MESSAGE, AL_CREATE_AT) SELECT al_id_seq.nextval, max_bids.USER_ID, max_bids.PRODUCTS_ID, (SELECT (nvl(max(AL_COUNT), 0) + 1) FROM ALERTS WHERE user_id = max_bids.USER_ID), 0, P_NAME, p.P_NAME || '이(가) 낙찰 되었습니다', sysdate FROM USERS u JOIN PRODUCTS p ON u.USER_ID = p.USER_ID JOIN (SELECT b.USER_ID, b.PRODUCTS_ID, max(b.AMOUNT) as max_bid FROM BIDS b JOIN PRODUCTS p ON p.PRODUCT_ID = b.PRODUCTS_ID WHERE b.AMOUNT IS NOT NULL AND p.P_SALES_STATUS = 3 GROUP BY b.PRODUCTS_ID, b.USER_ID) max_bids ON p.PRODUCT_ID = max_bids.PRODUCTS_ID WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM alerts WHERE USER_ID = max_bids.USER_ID AND PRODUCT_ID = max_bids.PRODUCTS_ID AND AL_MESSAGE = p.P_NAME || '이(가) 낙찰 되었습니다' )

INSERT INTO alerts (alert_ID, USER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, AL_COUNT, CHECKED_FLAG, P_NAME, AL_MESSAGE, AL_CREATE_AT) SELECT al_id_seq.nextval, p.USER_ID, p.PRODUCT_ID, (SELECT NVL(MAX(AL_COUNT), 0) FROM ALERTS al WHERE al.USER_ID = p.USER_ID) + 1, 0, p.P_NAME, p.P_NAME || '이 경매에 실패하였습니다.', sysdate FROM PRODUCTS p WHERE P_SALES_STATUS = 4 AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM alerts al WHERE al.USER_ID = p.USER_ID AND al.PRODUCT_ID = p.PRODUCT_ID AND al.AL_MESSAGE = p.P_NAME || '이 경매에 실패하였습니다.' )
mapper.update: update ALERTS set CHECKED_FLAG = 1, AL_COUNT = 0 where alert_ID = #{0}
